select.if: SELECT T.GROUP_ID_1,T.GROUP_ID_1_NAME,T.UNIT_ID,T.UNIT_NAME,T.STD_6_ID, T.STD_6_NAME,CASE WHEN T2.IS_DEFAULT = 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS IS_DIVIDE, T.HOUSE_PE,T.COVER_HOUSE_PE,T.JD,T.WD,T.ZW_NAME,T.ZW_NAME_NUM, T.SERVICE_NAME,T.SERVICE_NUM FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_6_STD T,PCDE.TAB_CDE_GROUP_CODE T2 WHERE T.UNIT_ID = T2.UNIT_ID AND T.STATE = 'U' AND T.IS_SIGN = 1 AND 1=2 ORDER BY T.GROUP_ID_1, T.UNIT_ID, T.STD_6_ID

mapper.select:
SELECT T.UNIT_ID, T.UNIT_NAME FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_GROUP_CODE T WHERE T.GROUP_ID_1 = #{group_id_1} AND T.IS_DEFAULT = 0
AND T.UNIT_NAME LIKE #{unit_name}
mapper.update: UPDATE PCDE.TAB_CDE_6_STD T SET T.UNIT_ID = #{unit_id}, T.UNIT_NAME = #{unit_name} WHERE T.STD_6_ID = #{std_6_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_NET_PERSON T WHERE T.STD_ID_6 = #{std_6_id} and T.DEAL_DATE>=to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMM')
